title: Ocean Waves
alternative_title: Umi ga Kikoeru, 海がきこえる
description: A tale of growing up in high school. High school students Taku and best friend Matsuno are figuring out what they would like to do with their lives when a girl named Rikako transfers into their school. Rikako is a smart, charming and sophisticated girl who had to move away from her urban surroundings, to a sea shore countryside village. But she has troubles of her own...
genre: [<Genre -> Drama>, <Genre -> Romance>, <Genre -> School>, <Genre -> Slice of Life>]
